distributeRewards(address[],uint256[],st.details: Only authorized callers (escrow contracts from authorized factories) can call this

params._amounts: Array of amounts (must match recipients length)

returns.success: True if all transfers succeeded, false if any failed

isAuthorized(address).details: Checks direct authorization or if created by authorized factory

isAuthorizedByFactory(address).details: This is gas-efficient: only checks one factory per call

returns._0: True if caller was created by this authorized factory

isEscrowFromFactories(address,address[]).details: Caller provides factory addresses to check (gas-efficient approach)

params._factories: Array of factory addresses to check

returns._0: True if escrow was created by any authorized factory in the list

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._authorized: True to authorize, false to deauthorize
params._caller: Address to authorize (individual escrow or other contract)

setAuthorizedFactory(address,bool).details: When factory is authorized, ALL escrows it created (past and future) are automatically authorized

params._authorized: True to authorize, false to deauthorize

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

authorizedCallers(address).notice: Mapping of directly authorized callers (for escrows not from factory)

authorizedFactories(address).notice: Mapping of authorized factories (not individual escrows!)

authorizedFactoryList(uint256).notice: Array of authorized factory addresses (for iteration)

getCurrentAllowance().notice: Get current allowance from reward source

isAuthorized(address).notice: Check if a caller is authorized (public view)

isAuthorizedByFactory(address).notice: Check if caller is authorized by checking a specific factory

isEscrowFromFactories(address,address[]).notice: Check if escrow was created by any of the provided factories

openMode().notice: If true, skip authorization check (open mode)

rewardSource().notice: The reward source (owner who holds GRMPS tokens)

setAuthorizedCaller(address,bool).notice: Authorize or deauthorize a specific caller (for escrows not from factory)

setOpenMode(bool).notice: Set open mode (if true, any caller can request rewards - use with caution!)

setRewardSource(address).notice: Set the reward source (who holds the tokens)
